# VirtualScroller.updateScrollerOffset() method

Recalculates the offset between [scroller element](./virtual-core.virtualscroller.setscroller.md) and [container element](./virtual-core.virtualscroller.setcontainer.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateScrollerOffset(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

By default debounced at `256` milliseconds and called automatically when:

- [setScroller](./virtual-core.virtualscroller.setscroller.md) was called;

- [setContainer](./virtual-core.virtualscroller.setcontainer.md) was called;

- [scroller element](./virtual-core.virtualscroller.setscroller.md) was resized.

Normally this is enough, needed only if something else would trigger this offset change.
